resources.string:
V1.1.1 (2015-06-24)
Added some account permissions to accommodate some devices.

V1.1.0 (2015-06-12)
Height/Gap/Species screen now optional.

\"N/A\" presented on Summary screen for observation sets with missing Height/Gap/Species data.

New values for Cover categories.

Dominant and Nondominant species entry on SiteDetail screen. The values are then used on the Height/Gap/Species screen for species counts.

Removed species name entry from Height/Gap/Species screen.

Moved credentials to a string resource file for exclusion from public repositories.

V1.0.1 (2015-04-12)
Corrected LandInfo name in Plot List Help text.
Initial public release

V1.0.0 (2015-04-10)
Release Candidate.
